ï»¿Machine Specifications Adapter Plugin
====================

This uses Machine Specifications to find specifications so that 
they can run within Gallio and be manipulated by Gallio-based tools.
=======

This uses Machine Specifications to find specifications so that 
they can run within Gallio and be manipulated by Gallio-based tools.
